ModMetaData.name: Mechanized Armor Set

ModMetaData.description:
This mod adds Mechanized Armor Set
[h1]Features:[/h1] - Mechanized Helm - Mechanized Plate Armor - Mechanized_Musket
[h1]ResearchPrerequisite:[/h1] - SteamPrototypes: Mechanized Helm,Plate Armor, Musket
collaboration project with "Pizzacat#2242" and "JangoDsoul" from "Rimworld Mod Market" Discord.
